label: Model/Source Registration
description:
## CMIP7 Model/Source Registration

Register a climate model or data source for CMIP7.

For CMIP7, this becomes the **source_id** in file metadata and directory structures.

label: Source ID
description: The unique identifier for this model or data source.

label: Model Description
description: Comprehensive description of the model or data source.
placeholder: Provide detailed description of the model/source...

label: Cohort
description: Select the publication status or data availability.

label: Institution(s)
description: Select all that apply for multi-institutional efforts.

label: Model Documentation Reference
description: Please register your EMD and then update this field by resubmitting the form from the issue comments.

label: Issue Handling Metadata [For internal use only]
description: ####\n## Issue Handling Metadata [For internal use only]

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
